attributes.action: Change the Dangerous Dogs Act 1991 to cover private property as well as public space
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Dangerous Dogs Act should be changed so that visitors and members of the public to private property such as homes are protected. Trespassers, burglers and theives should not be covered.

My 90-year old Grandmother was savaged by a friends dog - her face is permanently disfigured and it nearly killed her. Because the incident took place in the friend's front garden the police wouldn't do a thing and the dog is still free.
